entries.title: create-vue
entries.author: Evan You
entries.tldr: Unlike Vue CLI, create-vue itself is just a scaffolding tool: it creates a pre-configured project base on the features you choose, and delegates the rest to Vite. Projects scaffolded this way can directly leverage the Vite plugin ecosystem which is Rollup-compatible.
